body_content.explanation: a religion that worships many gods, especially a religion that existed before the main world religions:
examples: Nature beliefs were common in every variety of ancient paganism.

body_content.explanation: a modern religion that includes beliefs and activities that are not from any of the main religions of the world, for example the worship of nature:
examples: He was attracted to paganism - especially Wicca - because of its philosophy.
She believes that Christian churches can learn from paganism's emphasis on the Earth.
